Fighting is hard work, and even the deadliest combatant can be made weak through exhaustion. An exhausted comrade is a useless one!

If you fight without periodically recharging at a campfire, your Stamina worsens. And the worse your Stamina, the lower your maximum HP and MP.

You can check your Stamina by hovering your cursor over the heart-shaped icon near the top of the screen. Understood? "Go on..."

I just put a campfire in your bag. Right-click to use it, then stand nearby to recharge.

Stay at the fire until your Stamina reaches 120%, then talk to me again, and I'll explain more.

If you keep fighting without recharging at a campfire, your Stamina worsens. And the worse your Stamina, the lower your maximum HP and MP.

You can check your Stamina by putting your cursor over the heart-shaped icon near the top of the screen. When the percentage gets low, it's time to recharge.
